text: Landar, Landari, or Laudari(s) was the Duke of Friuli following Wechthari in 678. He himself died before 694, when Rodoald appears as his successor. ==Further reading== *Paul the Deacon. Historia Langobardorum. Translated by William Dudley Foulke. University of Pennsylvania: 1907. Category:694 deaths Category:7th-century Lombard people Category:7th-century rulers in Europe Category:Year of birth missing Category:Dukes of Friuli
title: Landar of Friuli
